ExampleSentences.Sentence: Very few guys could actually live with that on their conscience.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Niewielu ludzi mogłoby właściwie żyć z czymś takim na sumieniu.)

ExampleSentences.Sentence: Everyone has the right to freedom of religion, conscience and thought.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Każdy ma prawo do wolności wyznania, sumienia i myśli.)
